[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/rig-package](./rig-package.md) &gt; [ILoadForProjectFolderOptions](./rig-package.iloadforprojectfolderoptions.md) &gt; [bypassCache](./rig-package.iloadforprojectfolderoptions.bypasscache.md)

## ILoadForProjectFolderOptions.bypassCache property

If specified, force a fresh load instead of returning a cached entry, if one existed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
bypassCache?: boolean;
```
